featured.text: The mayor said new buildings would be illuminated, notably along the banks of the Seine, which would become a luminous strip, while Notre Dame Cathedral would be lit from the inside to show off its stained glass windows.
The sounds of Notre-Dame bells once again filled the air in Paris, and will be heard for generations to come.
Mounted in the two tall towers of the cathedral, Notre-Dame’s bells have been ringing for over 800 years.

definition.zh_def: 法語中表示「我們的」的形容詞，通常用於指代與說話者相關的事物或人。
definition.en_def: A French adjective meaning 'our', used to indicate possession or relation to the speaker.
